Judul: EVALUASI PEMBANGUNAN TRANSMIGRASI DENGAN METODE PROSES HIRARKI ANALITIK
Abstrak:
According to the act No. 15 Year 1997, the transmigration
program is aimed at: (1). Improving transmigrants' welfare and the
people living surroundings; (2). Improving and balancing regional
development; and (3). Strengthening nation's unity and entity.
Since the colonization period and during the implementation of
transmigration program, there are, however, no appropriate systems
and standard evaluation on transmigration development available
which are capable to measure its outcomes.
Through some review upon of input-process- output (I-P-0) of
each phase of transmigration development these are 4 parameters,
15 sub-parameters and 24 indicators of successful transmigration
development. Those are later on managed in a hierarchy. Structure,
and their standard norms and values will be stand and for
determined based on research data, so data analysis with the
Analytical Hierarchy Process (AHP) is available to be applied.
From same cases found is this study shows that out of 8
Transmigration Settlement Units (TSUs) spread out in 4 provinces,
three of them are considered to be very successful, 4 TSUs quite
successful and the rest one is considered to be fail.
If the method mentioned above would be applied, the benchmark
of the succesful transmigration development is not the achievment
of quantity of people resettled anymore, but the quantity and
quality outcome in the whole.
Fakultas: Sekolah Arsitektur, Perencanaan dan Pengembangan Kebijakan
